description: T353	Cupressus macrocarpa (Monterey cypress)FLG	Fell - Ground level	declining Cupressus with Coryneum canker, to facilitate replacement as a landscape improvement, due to the poor current aesthetic. Replacement species - Cercidiphylum japonicum.SPG	Stump - Remove / grind	following removal of tree.PNT	Plant replacement tree	(Cercidiphylum japonicum) during the first planting season (September to April) following tree removal.T704	Fraxinus ornus (Manna Ash)PRS	Prune from adjacent structure	to clear lamp column by 1 m.T733	Malus sylvestris (Wild Crab)LPD	Lift low canopy - Pedestrian clearance	to 2.5 m over garden footpath.T744	Prunus cerasifera ?Pissardii? (Pissard's Plum)PRS	Prune from adjacent structure	to clear parking sign by 1 m.T983	Cerasus serrulata (Japanese Cherry)FLG	Fell - Ground level	dead tree already reduced to a tall stump, to facilitate replacement.PNT	Plant replacement tree	(Halesia monticola) during the first planting season (September to April) following tree removal.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
